name: poly((R)-3-hydroxybutyrate-co-(R)-3-hydroxyhexanoate)
SMLTrestrictions: G35 Group Restriction No. 35 corresponds to FCM substance No. 467,744,1059. Group restriction specification is expressed as crotonic acid.
Restrictions: The substance is a macromolecule obtained from microbial fermentation. Only to be used at temperature conditions not exceeding the conditions defined in point 2.1.4(d) of Annex V. The migration of all oligomers with a molecular weight below 1 000Da shall not exceed 5.0 mg/kg food.
NotesCompliance: V23 When a final material/article containing this substance is placed on the market, a well described method suitable for use by a competent authority to determine oligomer migration compliance with the restrictions in column 10 Table 1 shall be part of the supporting document referred to in Art. 16. Reference shall be made if an adequate method is publicly available. If it requires a calibration sample, a sufficient sample shall be supplied to the competent authority on its request.
